1.caption_en:
Presentation slide titled "Introduction of the “Ecosystems Portfolio Map”" showing a large radial ecosystems portfolio map on the left and explanatory bullet-point text on the right describing how to map offerings, assets, competitors, and key user needs.

    "dark blue (#1f3a43)",

    },
    {
      "type": "radial_map",
      "position": "left",
      "description": "Large concentric circular diagram occupying the left half of the slide: outer ring labeled 'KEY MARKET ECOSYSTEMS', inner concentric rings with a central light-blue circle labeled 'KEY USER' and surrounding rings for needs/assets/offerings. Small legend and example list in the lower-left corner of the map. Dark border and subtle gridlines divide the map into segments.",
      "labels": [
        "KEY MARKET ECOSYSTEMS",
        "KEY USER",
        "NEEDS"
      ],
      "additional_notes": "Footer area of the map contains 'L1 - ECOSYSTEMS PORTFOLIO MAP' and small logos/QR code."
    },
    {
      "type": "text_block",
      "position": "right",
      "description": "Right-side explanatory text with heading and bullet list describing the tool and what to map.",
      "visible_text": "Helps you to analyze and draw strategic conclusions about your current and future market ecosystems.\n\nIt is a high-level company strategy tools, bringing a portfolio view and market ecosystem view together.\n\nBy mapping\n- your portfolio of offerings (platforms, products, services)\n- assets\n- competitors\n- and key user needs\nit creates a visual map ready to fuel your strategy process."
    },
    {
      "type": "footer",
      "position": "bottom",
      "description": "Narrow dark horizontal footer bar across the bottom of the slide containing the map label 'L1 - ECOSYSTEMS PORTFOLIO MAP', small icons/logos, and a QR code area."
    }
  ],
  "detected_text": "Introduction of the “Ecosystems Portfolio Map”\n\nHelps you to analyze and draw strategic\nconclusions about your current and future market\necosystems.\n\nIt is a high-level company strategy tools, bringing a\nportfolio view and market ecosystem view together.\n\nBy mapping\n\n- your portfolio of offerings (platforms, products,\nservices)\n\n- assets\n\n- competitors\n\n- and key user needs\nit creates a visual map ready to fuel your strategy\nDrocess.",
  "notes": "Slide is a clean, corporate-style layout with sans-serif typography, left-side graphic emphasis (radial map) and right-side explanatory bullets. Small OCR error: final word 'Drocess' likely intended to be 'process'."
}

2.caption_en:
A blank radial template titled "Key Market Ecosystems" showing a central "KEY USER" core surrounded by concentric rings and segmented sectors for mapping needs, enablers, producers, and orchestrators within a market ecosystem. The diagram includes an outer band for the ecosystem boundary and a small examples list of market types in the lower-left.

{
  "title": "KEY MARKET ECOSYSTEMS",
  "type": "radial diagram template",
  "layout": "concentric rings with radial segments",
  "center_label": "KEY USER",
  "center_prompt": "What is the primary need of the key user in this ecosystem segment?",
  "rings": [
    {
      "name": "inner circle",
      "purpose": "key user",
      "color": "white"
    },
    {
      "name": "inner ring",
      "purpose": "needs",
      "color": "light blue"
    },
    {
      "name": "middle rings",
      "purpose": "layers for mapping stakeholders or offerings (three concentric bands)",
      "color": "white/very light gray"
    },
    {
      "name": "outer band",
      "purpose": "market ecosystem boundary",
      "color": "light gray"
    }
  ],
  "radial_segments": {
    "count_estimate": 8,
    "visible_labels": [
      "ENABLERS",
      "PRODUCERS",
      "ORCHESTRATORS"
    ],

  },

  }
}

3.caption_en:
Slide introducing the "Ecosystems Portfolio Map," a radial template for mapping offerings, assets, competitors, and key user needs to inform company strategy. It provides a visual portfolio and market-ecosystem view to support strategic decision-making.

{
  "type": "slide",
  "title": "Introduction of the \"Ecosystems Portfolio Map\"",
  "language": "English",
  "purpose": "Helps analyze and draw strategic conclusions about current and future market ecosystems; combines portfolio and market ecosystem views.",
  "key_actions_mapped": [
    "portfolio of offerings (platforms, products, services)",
    "assets",
    "competitors",
    "key user needs"
  ],
  "visual_elements": {
    "diagram_type": "radial/portfolio map",
    "center_label": "KEY USER",
    "rings": 4,
    "approximate_sectors": 8,
    "outer_label": "KEY MARKET ECOSYSTEMS",
    "color_notes": "central rings highlighted in light blue; outer ring grey"
  },
  "footer_label": "L1 - ECOSYSTEMS PORTFOLIO MAP",
  "extracted_text": "Introduction of the “Ecosystems Portfolio Map”\n\nHelps you to analyze and draw strategic conclusions about your current and future market ecosystems.\n\nIt is a high-level company strategy tools, bringing a portfolio view and market ecosystem view together.\n\nBy mapping\n\n- your portfolio of offerings (platforms, products, services)\n- assets\n- competitors\n- and key user needs\nit creates a visual map ready to fuel your strategy process.",
  "usage": "High-level company strategy; create visual maps for strategic planning and ecosystem analysis.",
  "confidence": 0.87
}

4.caption_en:
A clean, mostly blank "L1 - Ecosystems Portfolio Map" template showing concentric rings and radial sectors for mapping market ecosystems, with a central "KEY USER" circle and surrounding label "NEEDS." The outer arc is labeled "KEY MARKET ECOSYSTEMS" and sector labels include "ENABLERS," "PRODUCERS," and "ORCHESTRATORS," with example text and logos in the bottom margin.
